name: d u c k w a n b r e d
name_original: d u c k w a n b r e d
description:
...This is truly a game if i do say so... - GNI -10/10

A million in a lifetime experience. - Game information teller -11.5/10

What the heck. - Game circle 

A great contender for game of the millisecond - Game lookout Premise

D u c k w a n b r e d is a game were you play as a duck, and try to get bread, however the bread will run away, making a cycle of the duck running and never being able to catch it, but is able to get a bite out of it, if it doesn't have bread in 160 milliseconds it will die. This is a metaphor of the cycle of self worth and greed.

Controls
  1.  Move the mouse pointer: Move the duck to get to the bread
  2. Click the duck: start the game 
Hope you enjoy! :)
